animated-container.name: Animated Container
animated-container.description: This container will appear with an animation (visible in preview only).

props.name: origin
props.description: Origin of the animation, e.g. from left.

props.name: distance
props.description: Distance where animation starts, e.g. '5rem', '10%', '20vw', etc.

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration in milliseconds.

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay in milliseconds.

props.name: rotateX
props.description: Starting rotation. X angle in degrees. Will transition from these values to 0 in all axes.

props.name: rotateY
props.description: Starting rotation. Y angle in degrees. Will transition from these values to 0 in all axes.

props.name: rotateZ
props.description: Starting rotation. Z angle in degrees. Will transition from these values to 0 in all axes.

props.name: opacity
props.description: Starting opacity value, before transitioning to the computed opacity.

props.name: scale
props.description: Starting scale value, will transition from this value to 1

props.name: easing
props.description: Easing function (CSS easing)

props.name: reset
props.description: Repeat animation every time elements become visible or only once as elements become visible

props.name: beforeReveal
props.description: Callbacks that fire for each triggered element reveal.

props.name: beforeReset
props.description: Callbacks that fire for each triggered element reset.

props.name: afterReveal
props.description: Callbacks that fire for each completed element reveal.

props.name: afterReset
props.description: Callbacks that fire for each completed element reset.

autosize-section.name: Autosize Section
autosize-section.description: This is a section which automatically takes the size of its content.

props.name: margin
props.description: Margin at the bottom of the last element.

form.name: Contact Form
form.description: This is a form which let your visitors get in touch with you.

props.name: sendTo
props.description: Your email (use formspree) or the URL of your server where the form will send data.

props.name: onsubmit
props.description: Fires when the form is about to be submitted. Use the 'event' object or return false to prevent submit.

hamburger.name: Hamburger Menu
hamburger.description: A "hamburger" menu for your site. Apply styles to the links with the style editor.

props.name: fixed
props.description: Does the hamburger icon stay when you scroll?

props.name: style
props.description: Does the hamburger icon stay when you scroll?

props.name: button-background-color
props.description: Background color of the hamburger button

props.name: button-border-color
props.description: Color of the border of the hamburger button

props.name: background-color
props.description: Background color of the menu when it is open

props.name: links
props.description: Content of the menu

type.name: text
type.description: The text for the element in the menu

map.name: Live Map
map.description: Display a map in your website. Your users will be able to move the map, zoom in and out in order to locate where you are exactly

props.name: url
props.description: URL of the map on openstreetmap.org

props.name: marker
props.description: Image to display at the center of the map (called a marker)

props.name: twitter
props.description: Your name on twitter

skill-bars.name: Skill bars
skill-bars.description: Represent a set of skills as progress bars.

props.name: bars
props.description: Bars and labels

props.name: speed
props.description: Time of the animation

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay before the animation

props.name: labelSize
props.description: Width of the label in percentage of the bar

props.name: barHeight
props.description: Height of the bars in pixels

slideshow.name: Slideshow
slideshow.description: Display a series of texts and images.

type.name: text
type.description: text to display in the slide

type.name: link
type.description: Link to open when the user clicks on the slide

props.name: animation
props.description: How should Unslider animate each slide? Right now, there's three different animation types

props.name: captionColor
props.description: the captions text color

props.name: captionBgColor
props.description: the captions background color

props.name: captionAlignH
props.description: the captions horizontal position

props.name: captionAlignV
props.description: the captions vertical position

props.name: autoplay
props.description: Should the slider move by itself or only be triggered manually?

props.name: speed
props.description: How fast (in milliseconds) Unslider should animate between slides.

props.name: delay
props.description: If autoplay is set to true, how many milliseconds should pass between moving the slides?

props.name: index
props.description: If this is set to an integer, 'first' or 'last', it'll set the default slide to that position rather than the first slide.

props.name: nav
props.description: Do you want to generate an automatic clickable navigation for each slide in your slider?

props.name: arrows
props.description: Do you want to add left/right arrows to your slider?

props.name: onchange
props.description: Fires the moment when the slide changes
